description.narrative: Output 2.5: By the end of 2021, the State Welfare Organization has strengthened capacity to provide care and support to children without effective caregivers., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: By the end of 2021, disadvantaged children and adolescents have improved access to quality education and benefit from social services and judicial proceedings which promote their best interests

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.5: By the end of 2021, the State Welfare Organization has strengthened capacity to provide care and support to children without effective caregivers.

description.narrative: The State Welfare Organization (SWO) continued to improve its institutional capacity to provide quality care and services for protection, growth and development of children in alternative care through development and adoption of related standards. In the context of COVID-19, vulnerable children, including children in alternative parental care and children with disabilities, received support to better cope with negative consequences of the outbreak. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/08/2020

title.narrative: The SOP for children without effective caregivers is adopted and implemented by SWO.

actual.value: 2019:The national SOP for provision of care and support services to children in family-based foster care settings has been adopted and is being implemented by SWO. Draft SOPs for children in nurseries (0-3 y) and children in residential care settings are available, to be finalized and adopted in 2020.

title.narrative: Availability of a national Standard Operating Procedure for provision of care and support services to children without effective caregivers.
